definitions.definition: a thing that may happen or be the case.
examples: the theoretical possibility of a chain reaction
synonyms: fear "there is a possibility that he might be alive"

definitions.definition: the state or fact of being likely or possible; likelihood.
examples: there was no possibility of recompense for him
synonyms: probability "they discussed the possibility of launching a new project"

definitions.definition: a thing that may be chosen or done out of several possible alternatives.
examples: one possibility is to allow all firms to participate
synonyms: solution "buying a smaller house is one possibility"

definitions.definition: unspecified qualities of a promising nature; potential.
examples: the house was old but it had possibilities
